items.name: Add item
items.body:
To add an item to your list, do: 

Press the '+' icon on top right corner, put any name (this will be used to identify the item), the url of the item and press 'Save'

items.name: Edit item
items.body:
To edit an item of your list, do: 

Press and hold the item you want to edit, press edit on the window that opens, do your modifications and press 'Save'

items.name: Delete item
items.body:
To delete an item of your list, do: 

Press and hold the item you want to delete, press delete on the window that opens and press 'Ok'

items.name: Export
items.body:
Export your list so you can import it later.

To export your list follow:

Menu (top-right corner) -> Export data -> Ok.

The file named 'shortcutme.txt' will be created at

 #{location}

items.name: Import
items.body:
To import your list, you have to put the file 'shortcutme.txt' (previously exported) in

 #{location}

 then follow:

Menu (top-right corner) -> Import data -> Ok

WARNING: this will replace or update your current items
